mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by DT.rgst_dt desc) as rownum , DT.DATA_ID AS DATA_ID , DT.SJ AS SJ , DT.CN AS CN , DT.VIEW_CNT AS VIEW_CNT , DT.RGST_ID AS RGST_ID , DT.RGST_DT AS RGST_DT , DT.MODI_ID AS MODI_ID , DT.MODI_DT AS MODI_DT , DT.USE_YN AS USE_YN , (CASE DT.USE_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN '게시' ELSE '미게시' END) AS USE_YN_NM , DT.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , TU.USER_NM AS RGST_NM , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = TU.DEPT_CODE) AS RGST_DEPT_NM FROM T_BBS_DATA DT LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER TU ON DT.RGST_ID = TU.USER_ID ) A
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_BBS_DATA
SELECT DATA_ID, SJ, CN, VIEW_CNT, USE_YN, RGST_ID, RGST_DT, MODI_ID, MODI_DT, DEL_YN FROM T_BBS_DATA WHERE DATA_ID = #{dataId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BBS_DATA SET VIEW_CNT = (COALESCE(VIEW_CNT, 0) + 1) WHERE DATA_ID = #{dataId}
UPDATE T_BBS_DATA SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MODI_ID = #{modiId} , MODI_DT = now() WHERE DATA_ID = #{dataId}
